resources.string: Sophomore at Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology pursuing B.Tech in Information and Communication Technology with minors in Computational Science. I am highly interested in Backend Web Development and Android Development and with my Development Skills, my aim is to make India completely \'Atmanirbhar\' in terms of technology by contributing as much as I can.
